mapper.select: select s.* ,(s.amount - m.upper_amount) as OVER_UPPER_AMOUNT from Stock_c s left join ( select * from material_ull_c ) m on m.repository_no = s.repository_no and m.material_no = s.goods_no where s.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND GOODS_TYPE = '1' and amount >= upper_amount

select s.* ,(s.amount-m.lower_amount) as OVER_LOWER_AMOUNT from Stock_c s left join ( select * from material_ull_c ) m on m.repository_no = s.repository_no and m.material_no = s.goods_no where s.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND GOODS_TYPE = '1' and amount <= lower_amount

select s.* ,(s.amount - p.upper_amount) as OVER_UPPER_AMOUNT from Stock_c s left join ( select * from product_ull_c ) p on p.repository_no = s.repository_no and p.product_no = s.goods_no where s.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND GOODS_TYPE = '2' and amount >= upper_amount

select s.* , (s.amount-p.lower_amount) as OVER_LOWER_AMOUNT from Stock_c s left join ( select * from product_ull_c ) p on p.repository_no = s.repository_no and p.product_no = s.goods_no where s.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND GOODS_TYPE = '2' and amount <= lower_amount
